channel.title: Tensorflow on Website of Dmitry Kabanov
channel.description: Recent content in Tensorflow on Website of Dmitry Kabanov

item.title: Saving state for tf.function-decorated functions
item.description: When you decorate a function with `tf.function` decorator, sometimes you need to keep state between invocations of this function.

item.title: Using `tf.function` for performance in Tensorflow 2
item.description: Tensorflow 2 uses so called Eager mode by default. In this mode, it is easy to define tensors interactively, for example, in ipython and see their values. However, in Eager mode the execution is slow, which becomes noticable during model training.
